body.p:
Mount Sterling March 7th 61
His Excellency Govr Magoffin
Frankford Ky

Dear Sir. A warrant was placed in the hands of one of my deputies to take Daniel, Thomas B. Judy. charged with the murder of Thomas Green in this County on the 5th instant Said Judy was taken by my deputy his trial was to have been to day but during last ^night^ said Judy made his escape, he is about 6 feet high very dark complexion black heavy beard and much of it quite long -- heavy head of black hair -- quite a good looking man and about 35 or 40 years of age I deemed it best to apprise your Excellency of these facts that a reward might be offered for him I will give one hundred dollars reward myself --
John S. Wyatt. Sheriff of Montgomery County
